title: Configure real subscription checkout links for Monthly and Annual plans

requirements.text: Update the subscription checkout URL configuration so the Monthly ($6.00) and Annual ($15.99) subscription CTA opens real outbound payment/checkout links when clicked.

quotes: Add a real payment link for Monthly ($6) and Annual ($15.99). So the site will send people there when they click

acceptanceCriteria: In frontend/src/config/subscriptionLinks.ts, subscriptionLinks.monthly is set to a non-empty, valid https URL for the Monthly ($6.00) checkout page.
In frontend/src/config/subscriptionLinks.ts, subscriptionLinks.annual is set to a non-empty, valid https URL for the Annual ($15.99) checkout page.
When a visitor selects Monthly and clicks the Subscribe button, the site opens the configured Monthly checkout URL in a new tab.
When a visitor selects Annual and clicks the Subscribe button, the site opens the configured Annual checkout URL in a new tab.
Click tracking continues to record clicks for 'subscription-monthly' and 'subscription-annual' before opening the outbound link.
No user-facing text is changed away from English.

constraints: Do not modify files under frontend/src/components/ui (read-only UI library components).
Keep the existing click-tracking mechanism and backend API unchanged (single-actor backend).
nonGoals: Implementing on-site payment processing (e.g., collecting card details on Boostly).
Integrating third-party payment SDKs (e.g., Stripe Checkout embedded, PayPal SDK).
Changing subscription prices or adding new subscription tiers.
